mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `file` SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), relTypeCode = #{relTypeCode}, relId = #{relId}, originFileName = #{originFileName}, fileExt = #{fileExt}, typeCode = #{typeCode}, type2Code = #{type2Code}, fileSize = #{fileSize}, fileExtTypeCode = #{fileExtTypeCode}, fileExtType2Code = #{fileExtType2Code}, fileNo = #{fileNo}, `body` = #{body}
